title.narrative: Mentoring as a way forward - youth leaders

description.narrative: The Youth leaders will be attached to the VU-YWCA international project ?Mentoring as a way forward?. This project wishes to target the shared values of YWCA and VU, by mentoring young people and children in sensitive situations in the society. The mentorship program will initially take place in a youth center chosen in collaboration between the two organizations. The project will focus firstly on creating a mentor guideline, which the youth leaders will oversee. Secondly, the guideline will help establish a foundation and a clear direction for the work to come. The core activity of the project will be to facilitate mentoring sessions, and the activities include recruiting and educating mentors. The Youth leaders will oversee the practical design and execution of workshops and mentor education seminars. The project will take place between February & June 2022 and will be strengthened by the capacity and presence of a joint effort, commenced both by the YWCA-members and VU-members.
